title: Night lighting dimming
ui_summary: Reduce lighting hours at night with dimming/controls.
ui_details_markdown: Assumes linear kWh with hours off.

title: CRRT stewardship (reduce unnecessary hours)
ui_summary: Targeted CRRT utilization to clinical indications.
ui_details_markdown: Local stewardship program reduces running hours.

title: Eliminate N₂O use
ui_summary: Stop N₂O in ICU; use alternatives.
ui_details_markdown: High GWP gas; common target for elimination.

title: Switch MDI to nebulizer when clinically appropriate
ui_summary: Propellants in MDIs have non-trivial GWP.
ui_details_markdown: Where safe & effective, prefer nebulizers or DPIs.

title: Switch to reusable isolation gowns
calc_formula_note: Reduce procurement slice proportional to reduction in disposables
ui_summary: Textile gowns laundered & reused; lower embodied carbon.

title: Increase plant-based foods
calc_formula_note: Reduce procurement proportional to plant-based adoption
ui_summary: Shift menus for patients/staff toward plant-forward options.
ui_details_markdown: Simplified percent reduction applied to procurement.

title: Eliminate disposable stethoscopes (move to reusable)
calc_formula_note: Assume linear reduction in procurement with % shift to reusable
ui_summary: Use reusable stethoscopes to cut single-use plastics/metals.
ui_details_markdown: Small but simple change; savings scale with adoption.

title: Use biohazard (red bag) waste only for blood-soiled items
baseline_label: Overuse of biohazard bags at baseline?
calc_formula_note: Better segregation reduces red-bag volume and treatment emissions
ui_summary: Right-size red-bag usage to cut incineration and transport.

title: Discuss goals of care on all admissions
baseline_label: Standardized goals-of-care on admission in place?
calc_formula_note: Proxy: lower low-value utilization reduces resource use
ui_summary: Earlier alignment may avert non-beneficial interventions.
ui_details_markdown: Hard to quantify precisely; conservative 5% proxy.

title: Use peripheral vasopressors when safe instead of central lines
ui_summary: Peripheral use (when appropriate) lowers device consumption.
ui_details_markdown: Clinical safety first; small but real savings.

title: Switch eligible IV medications to oral
calc_formula_note: % reduction applied to pharma category proportional to adoption
ui_summary: Oral formulations often have lower packaging and prep load.
ui_details_markdown: Scope to meds with equivalent efficacy/bioavailability.

title: Switch from incandescent/halogen to LED lighting
calc_formula_note: hours/day * beds * 365 * (kWh/bed·hour saved with LED) * local grid factor
ui_summary: LED retrofit reduces lighting electricity substantially.
ui_details_markdown: Assumes ~70% wattage reduction vs incandescent/halogen. Slide the hours/day of lighting affected.

title: Use natural daylight (shades up) during the day
calc_formula_note: hours_off * beds * 365 * kWh_per_bed_hour * local grid factor
ui_summary: Daylight harvesting: turn off lights when sunlit.
ui_details_markdown: Pair with occupancy/daylight sensors for best effect.

title: Improve building envelope/insulation
calc_formula_note: Reduced HVAC loads via insulation upgrades
ui_summary: Insulation/air sealing lowers heating and cooling demand.

title: Demand-controlled or variable-air-volume ventilation
ui_summary: Match ventilation to occupancy/CO₂; save fan & conditioning energy.
